data.stimulus:
TASK 1: REPORT SECTIONS

When you write a report, or any other kind of academic writing, structure is essential for making your argument clear. Look at the typical report sections given below and match them with the descriptions of what each section does. Can you see how the structure helps you to present your argument clearly to the reader? (For further information on the structure of reports, you can read the following page from the EAP Foundations website: https://www.eapfoundation.com/writing/reports/structure/)
